extendedInfo.description: The Bibione app is a tourist guide to Bibione, the famous seaside resort on the Eastern Veneto coast.This holiday destination on the Adriatic, famous for being the second most frequented resort in Italy, as well as having some of the most beautiful beaches in the Veneto, a safe, clean sea (which has been awarded the Blue Flag for the past 21 years) and rich, verdant flora, is the ideal destination for those who want a lively, regenerating holiday in a delightful, welcoming setting. The Bibione tourist guide is an inexhaustible source of information and suggestions, useful for discovering the many arts or food and wine events that take place in Bibione; for visiting the marvellous areas around the Municipality of San Michele al Tagliamento or for taking part in the great sports events hosted by the resort each year, which also distinguishes itself for being one of the best spa centres in the region where you try therapies or enjoy beauty and wellness treatments. The Bibione guide includes complete, up-to-date information on hospitality, restaurants, beaches, night life, excursions, sports activities, the arts, transport service and useful and emergency numbers Bibione. The app works offline, but in a few seconds you can connect to the links suggested in the various sections and to in-depth pages. Thanks to its internal search engine you can quickly find lots of useful information. Practical, rapid and functional, Bibione App is a real resource for experiencing a holiday in Bibione to the full or for discovering and falling in love with this delightful tourist resort on the Adriatic. The main features of the app are offline functioning, a complete list of hotels, agencies, campsites and holiday villages, classifications by area and by category, info on beaches and consortiums, shops and restaurants, fun and culture, telephone numbers and Internet sites, geo-localisation, services for tourists, useful and emergency numbers, search engines, Internet sites, contacts and telephone numbers.

reviews.title: Useful but one glitch.
reviews.comment: When you click on \"market\" you get festival info, and vice versa.
reviews.author: A Google User
